attributes.action: provide a savings guarantee for all depositors in Icesave
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Having been prepared to effectively secure the deposits of those depositors in Northern Rock, Bradford & Bingley, as well as Cheshire and Derbyshire Buidling Society by various methods, this petition seeks to provide assurance to all depositors in Icesave and Heritable Bank.

This particularly applies to all depositors with balances over the      £ 50,000 limit provided by the FSCS.

There are approximately 15,000 people affected who stand to lose significant amounts.
